trans-unit.target: TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_SUBMARINE_SELECT_TITLE<tab>Vessels deployed: <var 20 E803 /var>/<var 20 E804 /var> Ceruleum tanks: <var 20 E802 /var> Select a submersible.
TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_ADD_NEW_SUBMARINE<tab>Outfit and register a submersible. (Dive credits required: <var 20 E802 /var>)

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_SUBMARINE_NAME<tab><var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var>. (Rank: <var 20 E806 /var>) <var 09 E803 (()) (()) (( (Voyage complete in <var 08 E1E80701 ((<var 20 E807 /var>d )) (()) /var><var 08 E1E80401 ((<var 20 E804 /var>h )) (()) /var><var 20 E805 /var>m))) /var>

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_SUBMARINE_CMD_TITLE<tab>Vessels deployed: <var 20 E805 /var>/<var 20 E806 /var> Ceruleum tanks: <var 20 E803 /var> <var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var> (Rank: <var 20 E804 /var>) - Available

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_SUBMARINE_VOY_TITLE<tab>Vessels deployed: <var 20 E804 /var>/<var 20 E805 /var> <var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var> (Rank: <var 20 E803 /var>) - Deployed Voyage complete in <var 08 E1E80601 ((<var 20 E806 /var>d )) (()) /var><var 08 E1E80701 ((<var 20 E807 /var>h )) (()) /var><var 20 E808 /var>m

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_SUBMARINE_NAME_MES_0<tab>Names must be formed from alphanumeric characters. The following punctuation marks are also allowed: <var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>'<var 1D /var>. , : ; ! ? & - _<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> • Double spaces/underscores are not allowed. • A space cannot be used before or after the name. • Names consisting solely of punctuation marks are prohibited.

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_REMOVE_SUBMARINE_TITLE<tab>Are you certain you wish to dismantle <var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var>? <var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>Please note that while submersible components will be returned, your submersible's registration, rank, and accrued experience will be lost.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_REGISTRATION_1<tab>To outfit and register a submersible, you must have in your possession the requisite components and dive credits.

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_REGISTRATION_2<tab><var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Dive credits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_REGISTRATION_3<tab><var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Submersible components<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be constructed in your company workshop. Please note that hull, stern, bow, and bridge components are required to outfit a submersible.
TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_ENERGY<tab>You cannot deploy your submersible on subaquatic voyages without ceruleum tanks, which can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.

TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_EXPLOG_1<tab>Upon the completion of a subaquatic voyage, your mammet will provide a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> detailing the results.
TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_EXPLOG_2<tab>The information contained in this log may prove useful in preparing for your next subaquatic voyage.
TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_EXPLOG_3<tab>Please note that only the log for the previous voyage will be retained.
TEXT_HOUFIXCOMPANYSUBMARINE_00447_NO_REPAIR_ITEM<tab>You cannot repair submersible components without the requisite materials.
